title: entrepreneurship course(e-cell) queries
content:
jee aspirant here, who will shortly might be joining pesu.

I needed to know how the entrepreneurship course in pesu is for me to pursue it. And in terms of competition, how well does it stand from other universities with respect to the course mentioned above.

The main reason would be the location as, it is about 30minutes from my house and secondly, banglore being an IT capital, would allow my company to be noticed by others as well..

Would love to be joining your team next year!
